info.name: Surf VCard
info.summary: Admin API for VCard management between Nextcloud instances
info.description:
Surf VCard provides an OCS API for administrators to manage VCards across Nextcloud instances.
Features: - Create VCards in user address books via API - Retrieve VCards for synchronization - Trusted domain whitelist for security - Admin-only access control
Use case: Automatically add contacts when users accept invitations from federated instances.
info.author: SURF
